CheckTitle: Check if API Gateway stage uses an SSL certificate.
Description: Checks if a REST API stage uses an SSL certificate. The rule is NON_COMPLIANT if the REST API stage does not have an associated SSL certificate.
Risk: If the REST API stage does not have an associated SSL certificate, it may not be secure, and data transmission might be exposed to potential threats.

Recommendation.Text: Ensure that your API Gateway stage is configured to use an SSL certificate to secure data transmission.
